member.name: T:LiLo.Lite.UITest.AppManager
member.summary: Application manager.
member.remarks: Based on using the 'Page Object Pattern' Best Practices and Tips for Using Xamarin.UITest for details.

member.name: P:LiLo.Lite.UITest.AppManager.App
member.summary: Gets the main gateway to interact with an app. This interface contains shared functionality between Xamarin.UITest.Android.AndroidApp and Xamarin.UITest.iOS.iOSApp.

member.name: P:LiLo.Lite.UITest.AppManager.Platform
member.summary: Gets or sets the platform being tested.

member.name: M:LiLo.Lite.UITest.AppManager.StartApp
member.summary: Application StartUp configuration.
member.remarks: REMEMBER: - To use InstalledApp the app must be installed on the emulator - The emulator must be running BEFORE starting tests - Any updates to the app need to be deployed to the emulator, BEFORE they can be tested.

member.summary: Gets the main gateway to interact with an app. This interface contains shared functionality between Xamarin.UITest.Android.AndroidApp and Xamarin.UITest.iOS.iOSApp.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the application is on Android.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the application is on iOS.

member.summary: Gets an action on a trait for the test.

member.name: M:LiLo.Lite.UITest.BasePage.AssertOnPage(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Verifies that the trait is still present. Defaults to no wait.
member.param: Time to wait before the assertion fails.

member.name: M:LiLo.Lite.UITest.BasePage.WaitForPageToLeave(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Verifies that the trait is no longer present. Defaults to a 5 second wait.
member.param: Time to wait before the assertion fails.
